title: How to Make Vegan Jello

steps.headline: Dissolve the agar-agar in a bowl of water.
steps.description: Mix it to dissolve it faster.

steps.headline: Pour the dissolved mixture into a saucepan.
steps.description: Add the juice, sugar, and water.

steps.headline: Bring to boil over medium high heat.
steps.description: Stir with a whisk or spoon from time to time. Continue the boil for about 1-2 minutes.

steps.headline: Take the saucepan off the stove and pour it into your mold(s).
steps.description: Do this quickly while it is hot, since it might set as it cools.

steps.headline: Put the mixture into the refrigerator for about 3-4 hours.

text: Dissolve the agar-agar in a bowl of water. Mix it to dissolve it faster. Pour the dissolved mixture into a saucepan. Add the juice, sugar, and water. Bring to boil over medium high heat. Stir with a whisk or spoon from time to time. Continue the boil for about 1-2 minutes. Take the saucepan off the stove and pour it into your mold(s). Do this quickly while it is hot, since it might set as it cools. Put the mixture into the refrigerator for about 3-4 hours.  Finished.
sentences: Dissolve the agar-agar in a bowl of water.
Mix it to dissolve it faster.
Pour the dissolved mixture into a saucepan.
Add the juice, sugar, and water.
Bring to boil over medium high heat.
Stir with a whisk or spoon from time to time.
Continue the boil for about 1-2 minutes.
Take the saucepan off the stove and pour it into your mold(s).
Do this quickly while it is hot, since it might set as it cools.
Put the mixture into the refrigerator for about 3-4 hours.
